name: Marketing Automation
author: VBOUT Inc.

sections.description:
This integration between Vbout and WordPress allows you to automate your marketing and tracking on your WordPress site using your Vbout account. Here is a list of the functions available through the plugin:

  • Schedule WP posts and pages to be sent to your social media channels
  • Mask your URL for tracking clicks and conversion through social media
  • Schedule posts to be sent as an email campaign to your subscribers on Vbout.com
  • Post now or schedule for future posting
  • Embed the Vbout.com tracking code on your site without touching the code
  • Choose your Vbout settings defaults for even quicker publishing
sections.installation: 1. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
